speaker.display_name: Dr D V S S Siva Sarma

report.title: "Learning Paradigms for Outcome Based Education in Digital Era"

description.text: <p>Abstract:</p> <p>Educational outcomes of an engineering graduate coming out of an academic program is continuously changing with time and they are much more significant in the context of explosion of information technologies. Developing higher order thinking skills and inculcate the skill of life long learning are recognized as the most sought after educational outcomes. Developing higher order thinking skills in a heterogeneous group of students in a class is a challenging task for teacher in a learner centric environment. This talk covers basics of the nuances of learning paradigms, teaching for learning outcomes, usage of ICT tools and experiential learning as part of teaching process that can help in the development of higher order thinking skills.</p>

report.keywords: Learning Outcome, Digital Era, Higher education

topic.title: “Learning Paradigms for Outcome Based Education in Digital Era”

report.title: Three-Day National Workshop On PEDAGOGICAL SKILLS FOR FACULTY IN OUTCOME-BASED EDUCATION

description.text: <p>About the Workshop<br />Pedagogy in higher education has undergone revolutionary changes during the last two decades. Traditional methods of lecturing have become obsolete in today&rsquo;s scenario where Outcome - Based Education and Learner Centric Teaching have become the order of the day. Further, usage of ICT in teaching-learning process is redefining the role of the teacher from a mere provider of information to a facilitator of learning. The event will be organized as a part of twinning program in association with UCE &amp; T, Bikaner Technical University, Bikaner Rajasthan.</p>

topic.title: Accreditation polocies - Forces to shape Indian Academic Engineering Research.
